ngoList.title: Khantura Chittopot
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Khantura Chittopot is established on 2nd of May in 2012. On the occasion of birth day of Satyajit Ray the great film maker of all time and a great writer. Its registered office of the society shall be situated at: Shubham, Kalitola, P.O.: Khantura, Dist.: North 24 Parganas, Pin: 743273, West Bengal. Our activities are to study, cultivate and demonstrate the art of drama in various forms. To build up a movement for popularizing the art of drama as a vehicle of education in collaboration with individuals and other societies. We will acquire, establish, start, run, maintain or manage Education Institution, libraries for the benefit of the people. We will promote the principle of equality of all cultures and the people within them, intercultural exchange and specific cultural skills. We will run an educational community childs group based on the idea of learning through play and emphasizing art, crafts, music and local knowledge. We will publish or cause to be published useful literatures, magazines etc. We want to establish and maintain an auditorium including stage and recording facilities for performing of the above art. We will promote and encourage advancement of literary, cultural, political, religious, scientific and technical education.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: We are working for improvement of our nation. Our organization works in rural area . Here we can see lots of poor children most of them form tribal societies do not have basic living needs. Our organization currently look after such 42 child from morning to evening by providing them 3 times foods, clothing and education. Beside we are planting eucalyptus trees frequently at both side of DVC canal. We have a free football academy with trained Coach helps to learn football in proper way.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: NA, Just we founded our NGO. We have not applied for any grant. We are working with our members donation only.

NA, This yer no grant sanctioned. Still We are working by our members donation, subscription fee and from others common help.But we required donation to full fill our bigger ambition in future, Beside we have started some potato cultivation work by investing our own members money and after selling the crop we donate all to our organization fund.

NA Still No grant sanctioned though we have applied for grants to The State Govt in various scheme( i.e. Khelasree Scheme). Still we are managing by our own donation and subscription fees. But already our budget has grown so we need much amount. We started fishing by hiring one local pond, after selling fishes all the profit is donated in our fund. But still we need more to grow our organization and to fulfill its dreams.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Padatik was formed in Lakshya, Purba Medinipur in 2008 by a group of progressive students. Our main aim academicians and local intellectuals to popularize the idea of experimental theatre and involve common people in theatre. Padatik reckons that theatre is not just a medium of joyful and creative expression of self, but it also brings about awareness of ones own self and of ones immediate and larger environment. Padatik believes in the power of theatre in attacking widespread social injustice. During the past three years, Padatik has performed in the small towns and villages of West Bengal, Uttarakhan, Delhiand as well as in all India. Our major performances on behalf of your Purba Medinipur(West Begal) District are Disaster management, MGNREGS, and Consumer Forum Awareness programme.
